snippet: This country has a history of facing tragedy and becoming better for it. Our next challenge is to address the epidemic of gun violence.
abstract: Editorial identifies signs that suggest many people are rethinking their views on gun control in wake of Newtown, Conn, murders; expresses hope that country will come together and that both political parties will have political courage to shake off National Rifle Assn and institute sensible gun control measures.
lead_paragraph: This country has a history of facing tragedy and becoming better for it. Our next challenge is to address the epidemic of gun violence.

headline.print_headline: Reason to Hope After the Newtown Rampage
